LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_CombatKnife.label: combat knife
LanguageData.VWE_MeleeWeapon_CombatKnife.description: One of mankind's oldest manufactured objects. The knife has taken many forms, but the concept has always remained the same: A handle for holding and a sharp edge for cutting.\n\nCombat knife is a standard issue melee weapon for most of the military forces.
